full_summary:
### Little Detroit Canadian Coast Guard Site – Helicopter Pad and Aid to Navigation Tower Demolition and Replacement

**Reference Number:** WS4245544404-Doc4245578810

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Publication Date:** October 17, 2023
**Tender Closure Date:** November 2, 2023 by 2:00 PM Eastern Daylight Time (EDT)
**Clearning Status:** Expired

**Project Description:**
The Canadian Coast Guard (CCG) requires the construction of a wooden helicopter pad and the demolition and replacement of an Aid to Navigation (AtoN) Tower at their LL1013 Little Detroit site. The project involves:

* Construction of a wooden helicopter pad
* Demolition of the existing AtoN Tower
* Replacement of the AtoN Tower with a new structure

**Contractual Requirements:**
The successful bidder must complete the entire project by June 28th, 2024.

**Key Information:**
* This is a two-phase process:
	+ Phase One will evaluate the qualifications of all interested suppliers
	+ Phase Two will invite the qualified suppliers to provide a financial bid on the project based on the specifications and drawings
* There will be no site visit for this requirement
* Please visit the SAP Ariba Discovery posting for complete details

**Trade Agreements:**
This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Procurement Category:**
Commercial and Service Procurement

**Mandatory Requirements:**
All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by November 2nd, 2023, by 2:00 PM EDT. Any bid submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive.

**Point of Contact:**
Jeffrey Cooper (SPAC/PSPC)

E-mail: jeffrey.cooper@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

Please direct any inquiries to the above contact.
